Mini Steps is a free-to-play platform game developed by NoaDev. It was released in October 2022 and has been praised for its addictive gameplay and simple controls. The game is available to play on web browsers, desktops, mobile devices, and tablets.

Gameplay

In Mini Steps, players control a small character who must jump across a series of platforms to collect coins. The levels are procedurally generated, so there is always something new to discover. The game also features a variety of power-ups that can help players reach higher scores.

Controls

The controls for Mini Steps are simple and easy to learn. Players can move their character left and right by tapping on the left and right side of the screen. They can also jump by tapping on the screen. The game also features a double jump mechanic, which can be used to reach higher platforms.

Objective

The objective of Mini Steps is to collect as many coins as possible before falling off the platform. Players can also try to beat their high score and unlock new characters.

Guide to Play

  1. Get familiar with the controls: Before you start playing, take some time to get familiar with the controls. This will help you avoid falling off the platform in the early stages of the game.
  2. Jump at the right time: Don’t jump too early or too late. When the platform is directly in front of you, tap the screen to jump.
  3. Use power-ups wisely: Power-ups can help you reach higher scores and collect more coins. Use them strategically to give yourself an advantage.
  4. Pay attention to the level design: The levels in Mini Steps are procedurally generated, so there is always something new to discover. Be aware of the layout of the platforms and try to find the best path to the finish line.
  5. Don’t give up: If you fall off the platform, don’t give up. Just try again and learn from your mistakes.

Mini Steps Tips

  • Use the double jump mechanic to reach higher platforms.
  • Collect coins to score points.
  • Use power-ups to give yourself an advantage.
  • Pay attention to the level design.
  • Don’t give up.

Conclusion

Mini Steps is a fun and addictive platform game that is perfect for casual gamers. With its simple controls and addictive gameplay, it’s easy to get lost in the world of Mini Steps for hours on end. So what are you waiting for? Start playing Mini Steps today!
